comment_0: Rename this file from example.config.json to config.json or create another file called config.json

DEVELOPER.comment_3: This is the array of discord user ids that can use developer only commands
DEVELOPER.comment_4: This is the array of discord server ids that the developer only commands get registered to
DEVELOPER.comment_5: This is the webhook url that will be used for logging errors

API_KEYS.comment_7: Get your API key from https://www.weatherapi.com/
